titles: The martyrdom of Theodora and of Didymus by a person of honour.
author: Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.
publisher: Printed by H. Clark, for John Taylor ... and Christopher Skegnes ...,
notes: Attributed to Robert Boyle.  Cf. BLC.
First edition; published later (1703) under title: Love and religion demonstrated in the martyrdom of Theodora, and of Didymus.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
